## Load Data

```{r }
#| label: load data
#| warning: false
#| message: false

alphabet_lookup <- setNames(1:26, LETTERS)

preprocessor <- function(dataframe) {

dataframe <- dataframe |>
    janitor::clean_names() |>
    
    mutate(loan_to_income = loan_amount / annual_income,
          risk_score = debt_to_income_ratio *40 + (1 - credit_score/850)*30 + interest_rate ^2,
          grade_combined = as.integer( alphabet_lookup[str_sub(grade_subgrade, 1, 1)]*5 +  as.integer(str_sub(grade_subgrade, 2,2))),
          credit_interest = credit_score * interest_rate / 100,
          income_credit = log1p(annual_income) * credit_score / 100,
          debt_loan = debt_to_income_ratio / log1p(loan_amount)
#          factor_income = factor(round(annual_income, -3)),
#          factor_loan_amount = factor(round(loan_amount, -2))
     ) |> 
  
    mutate(freq_annual_income = n(),
          .by = annual_income) |> 
    mutate(freq_debt_to_income_ratio = n(),
          .by = debt_to_income_ratio) |> 
    mutate(freq_credit_score = n(),
          .by = credit_score) |> 
    mutate(freq_loan_amount = n(),
          .by = loan_amount) |> 
      mutate(freq_interest_rate = n(),
          .by = interest_rate) |> 
   
    mutate(across(c(annual_income, debt_to_income_ratio, credit_score, loan_amount, interest_rate),
           \(x) as.numeric(scale(x)),
           .names = "scale_employment_status_{.col}"),
           .by = employment_status) |> 
  
    mutate(across(c(annual_income, debt_to_income_ratio, credit_score, loan_amount, interest_rate),
           \(x) as.numeric(scale(x)),
           .names = "scale_loan_purpose_{.col}"),
           .by = loan_purpose) |> 

    mutate(across(c(annual_income, debt_to_income_ratio, credit_score, loan_amount, interest_rate),
           \(x) as.numeric(scale(x)),
           .names = "scale_marital_status_{.col}"),
           .by = marital_status) |> 

    mutate(across(c(annual_income, debt_to_income_ratio, credit_score, loan_amount, interest_rate),
           \(x) as.numeric(scale(x)),
           .names = "scale_grade_subgrade_{.col}"),
           .by = grade_subgrade) |> 
    
    mutate(across(c(where(is.character)), ~ as.factor(.x))) 

return(dataframe)
}

raw_df <- read_csv(str_c(path, "train.csv"),
                   show_col_types = FALSE) 

tst_df <- read_csv(str_c(path, "test.csv"),
                   show_col_types = FALSE)  

all_df <-
    bind_rows(raw_df %>% mutate(source = "train"),
              tst_df %>% mutate(source = "test")) |>
          preprocessor() |> 
   mutate(loan_paid_back = factor(loan_paid_back))

train_df <- all_df %>% 
  filter(source == "train") %>% 
  select(-source) 

competition_df <- all_df %>% 
  filter(source == "test") %>% 
  select(-source, -loan_paid_back)


```

## Features

We will de-duplicate the training set and calculate a mean loan_paid_back figure.

```{r}
#| label: Features
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| fig.width: 6

conflicted::conflict_prefer("select", "dplyr")
conflicted::conflict_prefer("where", "dplyr")

features <- train_df %>%
  dplyr::select(-id, -loan_paid_back) |> 
  names()

train_df <- train_df %>% 
  dplyr::group_by_at(all_of(features)) |> 
  dplyr::summarise(id = min(id),
            loan_paid_back = first(loan_paid_back),
            .groups = "drop")

nom_features <- train_df |> 
  dplyr::select(dplyr::all_of(features)) |> 
  dplyr::select(dplyr::where(is.factor)) |> 
  names() 

logical_features <- train_df |> 
  dplyr::select(dplyr::all_of(features)) |> 
  dplyr::select(dplyr::where(is.logical)) |> 
  names() 

num_features <- train_df |> 
  dplyr::select(dplyr::all_of(features)) |> 
  dplyr::select(dplyr::where(is.numeric)) |> 
  names()
```

## Recipe

```{r}
#| label: recipe
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| fig.width: 6
                   
brulee_rec <- recipe(formula(paste0("loan_paid_back ~ ", str_c(features, collapse = " + "))), data = train_df) |> 
  step_dummy(gender, marital_status, education_level, employment_status, loan_purpose, grade_subgrade) |> 
  step_normalize(all_predictors())

```


## Torch 


```{r}
#| label: torch 
#| warning: false
#| message: false

mlp_brulee_spec <-
  mlp(hidden_units = 4L, # c(4L,4L), 
      epochs = 20L, 
      dropout = 0, 
      activation = "relu",
      learn_rate = 0.01
      ) %>%
  set_engine('brulee',
             rate_schedule = "cyclic",
             mixture = 0, ## weight decay default is 0.001
          #   optimizer = "Adadelta",
          #   batch_size = 2^5,
             validation = 0.02,
             verbose = TRUE,
             stop_iter = 5L) %>%
  set_mode('classification')
                   
wf <- workflow(brulee_rec,
               mlp_brulee_spec) 

classification_fit <- fit(wf, train_df)

classification_fit              

augment(classification_fit, train_df) |> 
  roc_auc(loan_paid_back, .pred_0)

classification_fit |> extract_fit_parsnip() |> autoplot()



```

```{r}
#| label: explainer
#| warning: false

explainer <- 
  explain_tidymodels(
    classification_fit, 
    data = train_df %>% dplyr::select(all_of(features)), 
    y = as.numeric(train_df$loan_paid_back),
    label = "Ensemble",
    verbose = FALSE
  )  %>% 
  model_parts()

ggplot_imp <- function(...) {
  obj <- list(...)
  metric_name <- attr(obj[[1]], "loss_name")
  metric_lab <- paste(metric_name, 
                      "after permutations\n(lower indicates more important)")
  
  full_vip <- bind_rows(obj) %>%
    filter(variable != "_baseline_")
  
  perm_vals <- full_vip %>% 
    filter(variable == "_full_model_") %>% 
    group_by(label) %>% 
    summarise(dropout_loss = mean(dropout_loss))
  
  p <- full_vip %>%
    filter(variable != "_full_model_") %>% 
    mutate(variable = fct_reorder(variable, -dropout_loss)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(dropout_loss, variable)) 
  
  if(length(obj) > 1) {
    p <- p + 
      facet_wrap(vars(label)) +
      geom_vline(data = perm_vals, aes(xintercept = dropout_loss, color = label),
                 linewidth = 1.4, lty = 2, alpha = 0.7) +
      geom_boxplot(aes(color = label, fill = label), alpha = 0.2)
  } else {
    p <- p + 
      geom_vline(data = perm_vals, aes(xintercept = dropout_loss),
                 linewidth = 1.4, lty = 2, alpha = 0.7) +
      geom_boxplot(fill = "#91CBD765", alpha = 0.4)
    
  }
  p +
    theme(legend.position = "none") +
    labs(x = metric_lab, 
         y = NULL,  fill = NULL,  color = NULL)
}
                   
ggplot_imp(explainer)
```                      

```{r}
  bind_cols(train_df) |> 
  mutate(
    .pred_class = factor(if_else(.pred_1 > 0.5, "1","0"))
  ) |>                    
  conf_mat(loan_paid_back, .pred_class) %>%
  yardstick:::autoplot.conf_mat(type = "heatmap") +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "RdPu")

  bind_cols(competition_df) |>
  transmute(
    id,
    loan_paid_back = .pred_1)


head(submit_df)  %>% 
     knitr::kable()      

submit_df  %>% 
  write_csv("submission.csv")
```   
